p: As well as, the need to pay attention to the prevention of endemic and infectious epidemic diseases, students are provided with the appropriate amount of information and preventive attitudes related to diseases and health problems, enabling them to protect themselves from these diseases before occur and face them in a proper scientific manner, as it explains to them the importance of vaccination against diseases and the importance extermination of diseases that carry diseases and the importance of visiting a doctor when signs and symptoms of COVID‚Äê19 appear.
